comments.body: This sounds important, should it be in both places so people have a higher change of reading it?

The order in the python files do not reflect the order in the documentation or man page.
If you think notes should be before module options, we should fix that in the template.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +35,39 @@    choices: [ failure, none, success ]
notes:
  - It is recommended to take a backup of the policies before adjusting them for the first time.
  - See this page for in depth information U(https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc766468.aspx).
seealso:
